title: Medieval/scribal-evoking roman type.
author: sanderpe

comments.content:
[Planewalker](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317084112/http:/www.dafont.com/search.php?q=planewalker) by Neale Davidson, 2011, with some adjustment of S and perhaps some other letters.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317084112im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Planewalker_4477.jpg)
  
Don
The minuscule foot serif angles and the ‹S› is a bit unfortunate, but it’s close enough to give off the same feel. Thanks!

These serif fonts are just cool.  
Thanks!  
 [Game of War Fire Age Hack](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317084112/http:/cleanhacks.net/game-of-war-age-gold-hack/)
